name: Splitty Kitty
description:
Splitty Kitty. Split them kits, then pop their balls.

Swipe to split a kit, then tap to pop. Unpopped balls turn back into kitties, try and clear the screen as more kitties fire on.

Use the Bombcat and Freezebomb to blast those kitties. Can you find the Golden pussy?

FURious feline action. Don't let them ruin your life!
